title: Why Is Inflation So High Right Now? 6 Reasons - Ep 156
itunes:title: Why Is Inflation So High Right Now? 6 Reasons - Ep 156
description:
You may have noticed that prices everywhere are rising. The question is: why? Vitaliy spells out the main causes of inflation, and how they compound to curtail economic growth.

I Kid You Not Crazy article link: https://contrarianedge.com/i-kid-you-not-crazy/

Why Green Energy is a Luxury Belief – But Won’t Be One Forever article link: https://contrarianedge.com/why-green-energy-is-a-luxury-belief-but-wont-be-one-forever/

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/why-is-inflation-so-high-right-now-6-reasons/
